#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int reverse(int num){
	int res = 0;
	while(num>0){
		int temp=num%10;
		num=num/10;
		res = (res*10) + temp;
	}
	return res;
}

int main(){
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		int num;
		cin>>num;
		int reversed = reverse(num);
//		cout<<" Reversed:"<<reversed<<endl;
		while(num!=reversed){
			num++;
			reversed = reverse(num);
//			cout<<" Reversed:"<<reversed<<endl;
		}
		cout<<reversed<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
